name: NightFall Hollow
storyline:
A strange email from an unknown source... A town with a rich supernatural history.. What mystery awaits to be discovered in the small town of Nightfall Hollow?

You play as Neo an investigative journalist as you explore the open, living, pixel art town and meet all of its residents.
During your investigation you will solve puzzles, Hunt for clues and items to help you, meet and talk to all the residents where your discoveries and choices matter!
Can you Solve all the puzzles, find all the hidden clues and get to the truth of the town!
summary:
Nightfall Hollow is a rich story driven game with a paranormal edge. Your choices matter in this game, Residents will remember your dialogue choices and they 'MAY' help you with your investigation or ignore you - depending on what you do! and what you find along the way!

A lot of love has gone in to the lore of Nightfall Hollow, and we hope you enjoy discovering it
